blogs.title: Keep Away From the Androids and Space Eggs
blogs.author: Ellen Ripley
blogs.excerpt: After surviving the deadly, but classified events of the ship Nostromo, Ripley tells audiences the top ten lessons she learned about love, loss, and aliens.

blogs.title: How to Tell If Your Girlfriend is an Android
blogs.author: Rick Deckard
blogs.excerpt: After 17 years of experience, Blade Runner Rick Deckard, gives a step by step guide on how to administer the 'Voigt-Kampff' test, to tell whether your subject is a replicant or human.

blogs.title: The Adventures of a Royal Drama Queen
blogs.author: Princess Vespa
blogs.excerpt: Have you experienced cold feet?  Is your best friend a robots?  Trouble finding room in your luggage for your giant hair dryer?

blogs.title: Being Hunted
blogs.author: Major Alan 'Dutch' Schaefer
blogs.excerpt: Major Schaefer tells his riveting experience of being hunted by an advanced extra-terrestrial while on a mission to save hostages in Central America

blogs.title: Protect and Serve
blogs.author: Officer Alex J. Murphy aka. RoboCop
blogs.excerpt: A guide on finding a loop hole in your fourth directive, in order to serve the people and seek justice.

blogs.title: Finding Higher Ground
blogs.author: Valentine McKee
blogs.excerpt: After surviving a team of graboids, McKee tells readers the 5 rules they need to follow to survive an attack.

blogs.title: How To Guide on Hacking Alien Software
blogs.author: David Levinson
blogs.excerpt: Need to fly an alien saucer?  Trying to take down the mother ship?  MIT technology expert gives you his tips and tricks for saving the world.

blogs.title: Big Things in Small Packages
blogs.author: James Darrell Edwards III
blogs.excerpt: From the Series 4 De-Atomizer, to his personal favorite, The Cricket, Edwards lists his favorite weapons used by the Men in Black.

blogs.title: Bug Infestations and Other Space Chores
blogs.author: Leiutenant John 'Johnny' Rico
blogs.excerpt: Dealing with an infestation of arachnids?  Trying to get blood off your uniform?  Federal Service Leiutenant Johnny tells readers about his favorite space life hacks.

blogs.title: What's My Name?
blogs.author: Guy Fleegman
blogs.excerpt: After being given the identity of 'Crewman #6', Guy Fleegman chronicals the journey of finding his identity, purpose, and home.
